snippet: Jay-Z, who owns one-fifteenth of a percent of the Brooklyn Nets, has put his mark on almost every facet of the enterprise, his partners say.
abstract: Hip-hop superstar Jay-Z owns only one-fifteenth of a percent of the Brooklyn Nets, but has put his mark on almost every facet of the enterprise; his influence on, and contributions to, the team and the Barclays Center project have been wildly disproportionate to his ownership stake, and so is the money he stands to make from it; when the center opens, he is slated to perform eight sold-out shows to kick things off.l
lead_paragraph: Jay-Z, who owns one-fifteenth of a percent of the Brooklyn Nets, has put his mark on almost every facet of the enterprise, his partners say.

headline.seo: Jay-Z’s Influence on the Nets Eclipses His Ownership Stake
headline.main: With Arena, Rapper Rewrites Celebrity Investors’ Playbook
headline.print_headline: With Arena, Rapper Rewrites Celebrity Investors’ Playbook
